title: Vivir Bonito - Restaurante
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Colombian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Welfare and conscious nutrition centre with also an organic restaurant as well health food store. Serves breakfast, daily lunch set, juices, and a la carte menu with quiche, burger, lasagna, and pizza.
